subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board has ordered Rick Dutrow to show it why his license should not be revoked and why he should not be banned from the state’s racetracks.
snippet: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board has ordered Rick Dutrow to show it why his license should not be revoked and why he should not be banned from the state’s racetracks.
